alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 03 at 4:44AM CDT until November 03 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley and Southern Tularosa Basin Counties. In Texas, Western El Paso County and Eastern/Central El Paso County Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 10 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS... Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County
